mapper.insert: insert into user( user_uid, user_upass, user_uname, user_nickname, user_email, user_phone, user_gender, user_birth, user_address1, user_address2 ) value (#{user_uid},#{user_upass},#{user_uname},#{user_nickname},#{user_email},#{user_phone},#{user_gender},#{user_birth},#{user_address1},#{user_address2})
mapper.update: update user set user_nickname=#{user_nickname}, user_birth=#{user_birth}, user_gender=#{user_gender}, user_phone=#{user_phone}, user_email=#{user_email}, user_address1=#{user_address1}, user_address2=#{user_address2}, user_auth=#{user_auth} where user_uid=#{user_uid}

update user set user_uname=#{user_uname}, user_phone=#{user_phone}, user_address1=#{user_address1}, user_address2=#{user_address2}, user_birth=#{user_birth}, user_nickname=#{user_nickname}, user_email=#{user_email}, user_ment=#{user_ment} where user_uid=#{user_uid}
update user set user_img=#{user_img} where uid=#{uid}
mapper.select: select seed_point, count(auction_key) auction, user_nickname, user_img, user_ment from seed, auction, user where seed_uid = auction_seller and seed_uid=user_uid;
select count(follow_from) as ftotal , count(follow_to) as ttotal from follow where follow_from = #{follow_from}
